Actual Moisture Content

Source: R/fun_salt_AMC.R
fun_salt_AMC.Rd

Calculate the Actual Moisture Content from sample measurement data

Usage

fun_salt_AMC(
  sample_container_mass,
  initial_sample_container_mass,
  dry_sample_container_mass
)

Arguments

sample_container_mass

Sample container Mass, m_c (g)

initial_sample_container_mass

Initilial sample including container Mass, m_ics (g)

dry_sample_container_mass

Dry sample including container Mass, m_dcs (g)

Value

AMC, Actual Moisture Content (wt %)

Examples

fun_salt_AMC(8.45, 15.619, 15.198)
#> [1] 6.238886
